git clone https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk.git
cd indy-sdk/
git checkout rc
docker build -f ci/indy-pool.dockerfile -t indy_pool .
docker run -itd -p 9701-9708:9701-9708 indy_pool

sudo apt install openssl
apt install php
apt install curl
apt install php-sqlite3
cd Privacy-and-Data-Sovereignty/Authorization-Server/
php -S localhost:8000
curl http://localhost:8000 -d 'grant_type=verifiable_credentials'
curl http://localhost:8000 -d 'grant_type=verifiable_credentials&cred_def_id=NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1&aud=sofie-iot.eu&sub=myidentifier&proof=proof'

python3 endorser.py -s
python3 user.py -s
python3 user.py -g


Register client DID
python3 endorser.py -r '{"reqId":1579023661334027416,"identifier":"W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC","operation":{"type":"1","dest":"6R1teTNtFAE1EHLLi9jkoE","verkey":"3x9eNZ3PD52oz1ASFwBm46BxCcqTLSZ8679AfGvNP3z3"},"protocolVersion":2}'

Create credentials definition
python3 endorser.py -d '{"name": "JWT", "version": "1.0", "attributes": ["resource","actions"]}'

Create credential offer
python3 endorser.py -o "NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1"

python3 user.py -c "NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1"

Create credential request
python3 user.py -o '{"schema_id":"NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0","cred_def_id":"NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1","key_correctness_proof":{"c":"75675624326168487284320957240212091278353736015189196604702123303986446183037","xz_cap":"","xr_cap":[["actions",""],["resource",""],["master_secret",""]]},"nonce":"226904623652984669503186"}' -c '{"ver":"1.0","id":"NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1","schemaId":"NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0","type":"CL","tag":"TAG1","value":{"primary":{"n":"","s":"","r":{"master_secret":"","actions":"","resource":""},"rctxt":"","z":""}}}'

Crete credential
python3 endorser.py -c '{"prover_did":"6R1teTNtFAE1EHLLi9jkoE","cred_def_id":"NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1","blinded_ms":{"u":"","ur":null,"hidden_attributes":["master_secret"],"committed_attributes":{}},"blinded_ms_correctness_proof":{"c":"9403854136721423028764591012572302850767776353369739764664471710034147345449","v_dash_cap":"","m_caps":{"master_secret":"1875704231578929020133546808020331923717834643757591529896101896184726686052799984548648732127237199713903561999488179604350689339790501561858550430076945017456821642568566153981"},"r_caps":{}},"nonce":"700508910019514492096358"}' -f '{"schema_id":"NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0","cred_def_id":"NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1","key_correctness_proof":{"c":"75675624326168487284320957240212091278353736015189196604702123303986446183037","xz_cap":"","xr_cap":[["actions",""],["resource",""],["master_secret",""]]},"nonce":"226904623652984669503186"}'  -v '{"resource": {"raw": "sofe-iot.eu", "encoded": "5"}, "actions": {"raw": "get", "encoded": "2"}}'
